text: East Side Mario's is a Canadian casual dining restaurant by Prime Restaurants. It has restaurants in Canada and the United States. The restaurant is known for Italian-American cuisine. It has over 100 locations in Canada as well as some in the United States. It is a sponsor of the Canadian Breast Cancer Foundation. == References== Category:Canadian restaurants Category:1987 establishments in Canada Category:Companies based in Mississauga
title: East Side Mario's
